That's a great idea! Using your loyalty points to get a discount on your TV purchase can definitely help sweeten the deal.

Remember to check the loyalty program's terms and conditions to see how many points are required for a specific reward or discount. You might need to redeem a certain number of points to get a discount, or you might have a choice between different rewards.

Also, don't forget to ask about any additional promotions or discounts that might be available on top of your loyalty points. You might be able to stack your points with other offers to get an even better deal.

It's always a good idea to know the details of your loyalty program and its benefits before making a purchase. By doing your research, you can make the most of your points and get the best value for your money.

Good luck, and I hope you score a great deal on your new TV!
